questions.text: Which of the following is true about radiotherapy?

options.label: A
options.text: Intensity is inversely proportional to squared distance

options.label: B
options.text: Vomiting is a late adverse reaction

options.label: C
options.text: Rapidly proliferating cells are most radioresistant

options.label: D
options.text: All the adverse effects are reversible

questions.correct_answer: A. Intensity is inversely proportional to squared distance
